name: Drill Reset
description:
WASD Controls + Mouse
F or V key to Reset

Unfortunately in the jam build of this game the 'Main Mountain' is broken, so you should go down to 'Random Mountain' when presented with the oppurtunity. Also [F] or [V] can be pressed at the death screen to return to the hub, not [spacebar].

A unique digging game where you drill up a mountain.
Features both a set area and randomly generated ones.

Made for Stencyl Jam #19
